data.question: What is the chemical formula for the compound with n=1 in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
What property do all materials in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series exhibit at low temperatures?
True or False: The dielectric relaxation in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series is caused by the dynamic movements of polyammoniums.
What is the role of polyammoniums in the synthesis of the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
data.answer: Polyammoniums direct the length of the cavities in the framework.

data.question: True or False: The Néel temperatures for the compounds in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series are around 10 K.
What is the topology of the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
True or False: The magnetic measurements for the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series were performed using a Quantum Design MPMS XL5 SQUID system.
What causes the slow dielectric relaxations in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
data.answer: The dynamic movements of polyammoniums between favored sites or orientations within the cavities.

data.question: True or False: The hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series shows reduced spontaneous magnetizations from di- and tri- to tetra-ammoniums.
What is the effect of increasing the length of polyammoniums in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
data.answer: It increases the length of the cavities in the framework to match the ammoniums.

data.question: True or False: The hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series exhibits weak ferromagnetism.
What is the chemical formula for the compound with n=3 in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
True or False: The hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series was synthesized using a convenient solution method.
How does the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series demonstrate the length-directing effect of polyammoniums?
data.answer: By showing a hierarchy in the binodal topologies with increasing length of the cavities to match the ammoniums.

data.question: True or False: The hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series does not exhibit any dielectric properties.
What is the chemical formula for the compound with n=2 in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
What is the significance of the (412·63)(49·66)n topology in the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series?
data.answer: It indicates the hierarchical structure of the framework with varying lengths of cavities.

data.question: True or False: The hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series was only studied for its magnetic properties.
What are the observed properties of the hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series at low temperatures?
True or False: The hierarchical cobalt-formate framework series exhibits strong ferromagnetism at room temperature.
